start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate the data. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API Key. See the docs for information on how to generate this key.

base_url.title: Base URL
base_url.description: Base PostHog url. Defaults to PostHog Cloud (https://app.posthog.com).

project_id.title: Project ID
project_id.description: You can find the project ID in the URL of your PostHog dashboard. Create a separate source for each project.

events_time_step.title: Events stream slice step size (in days)
events_time_step.description: Set lower value in case of failing long running sync of events stream.
